<div style="width=80%;margin-top:0;margin-bottom:0;">
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Details</h3>
<p align="justify">
This dataset draws individual mining operations, derived through a dense database of Landsat acquisitions. Individual polygons are drawn within a 10 km buffer from the approximate geographical coordinates of more than 6,000 active mining sites across the globe.
</p>

<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">Subdatasets</h3>
<details style='cursor:pointer;border: none;box-shadow: 3px 3px 4px #f8f8f8;'>
<summary style="font-size: 16px;">`extent` | Spatial extent of individual mines</summary>
|content|description|
|-------|-----------|
|ogc_fid0|Unique feature identifier|
|iso3_code|ISO3 code of country where mine is located|
|country_name|Name of country where mine is located|
|area|Area of polygon (m2)|
</details>
<h3 style="margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;">masDMT query</h3>
<div style="width=80%;margin-top:5;margin-bottom:5;background-color:#777777;">
```{r eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
# data call without specifying subdataset and resolution
list_data("globalMines")

# data call for specific subdataset 
list_data("globalMines/extent")

# data call to subdataset with a specific resolution
list_data("globalMines/extent/30m")
```
</div>
